name: RageCube
description:
Description:

RageCube is a tough platformer for the hardened gaming veteran! Far in development, good quality guaranteed.

Features:

Simple, easy to pick up controls

1 large, challenging level

Hand-made sprites and backgrounds

Hidden secrets

Highscores

Achievements

Awesome soundtrack by Eczas

Coming Soon:

2 more levels and a boss, all soon to be ready!

Hardcore mode

More achievements

More secrets

Note:

This game is a work in progress, if you find any bugs or have an idea for improvement please email me at robin.bjorkmol@gmail.com
